meanings.definition: A system of enclosed walkways connecting buildings in a city.
meanings.sent1: The pedway in the city made it easy to walk between the buildings.
meanings.sent2: I took the pedway to avoid the busy streets.
meanings.sent3: The pigeons on the pedway seemed to have their own traffic rules.
meanings.sent4: The pedway was a lifeline during the rainy season, keeping us dry and connected.
meanings.sent5: Navigating the pedway maze felt like a fun adventure.

meanings.sent1: The pedway through the park was lined with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: We strolled along the pedway enjoying the fresh air.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels on the pedway were having a race to the end.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the pedway brighter than any streetlight.
meanings.sent5: The pedway snaked through the forest like a ribbon of concrete.
